pppxConfigTable.name: pppxConfigTable
pppxConfigTable.description: A table of PPP protocol entity configuration information.

pppxConfigEntry.name: pppxConfigEntry
pppxConfigEntry.description: An entry in the PPP Entity Configuration table, containing information about PPP protocol configuration.

pppxConfigPeerID.name: pppxConfigPeerID
pppxConfigPeerID.description: The PPP peer ID. This is used as a unique ID to identify a PPP entity and to associate PPP links to it. For 'normal' PPP, there is one entry in the link table. For Multilink PPP there are one or more multiple links. In either case the Link table is indexed by Link index (one per link) and by Peer ID. When one or more entrys in the link table has the same Peer ID, then these entries form a group for use either for Multilink PPP, or as a rotary group.

pppxConfigDescription.name: pppxConfigDescription
pppxConfigDescription.description: A description for this PPP port or peer group.

pppxConfigAdminStatus.name: pppxConfigAdminStatus
pppxConfigAdminStatus.description: This object controls the Administrative Status of this PPP Entity. Enabled will allow the PPP Entity to operate. Disabled will disable the PPP Entity without deleting it. Delete will disable the PPP entity and delete the PPP configuration record.

pppxConfigMode.name: pppxConfigMode
pppxConfigMode.description: This object controls whether or not Multilink PPP will be used.

pppxConfigBridgingVLAN.name: pppxConfigBridgingVLAN
pppxConfigBridgingVLAN.description: The VLAN Group for PPP bridging. A value of zero(0) indicates that this PPP port will not perform a bridging service and will discard all bridged format packets received or transmitted. A non-zero value indicates the bridging VLAN to be used.

pppxConfigRoutingVLAN.name: pppxConfigRoutingVLAN
pppxConfigRoutingVLAN.description: The default VLAN for new PVCs that have not been configured for a routing Service. A value of zero(0) indicates that unconfigured VCs will not perform a routing service and will discard all routed format packets received or transmitted. A non-zero value indicates the routing VLAN to be used if the network informs the port of a new VC.

pppxConfigCompressionType.name: pppxConfigCompressionType
pppxConfigCompressionType.description: This object controls whether or not PPP will not perform compression (none) or the type of compression to attempt to negotiate for.

pppxConfigBridgingMode.name: pppxConfigBridgingMode
pppxConfigBridgingMode.description: The default Briding Mode, 0 = BRIDGE_ALL, 1 = ETHERNET ONLY 2 = Bridge All No FCS, 3 = Ethernet Only No FCS

pppxConfigIpConfigAdminStatus.name: pppxConfigIpConfigAdminStatus
pppxConfigIpConfigAdminStatus.description: The immediate desired status of the IP network protocol. Setting this object to open will inject an administrative open event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine. Setting this object to close will inject an administrative close event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine.

pppxConfigBcpConfigAdminStatus.name: pppxConfigBcpConfigAdminStatus
pppxConfigBcpConfigAdminStatus.description: The immediate desired status of the BCP network protocol. Setting this object to open will inject an administrative open event into the BCP network protocol's finite state machine. Setting this object to close will inject an administrative close event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine.

pppxConfigIpxConfigAdminStatus.name: pppxConfigIpxConfigAdminStatus
pppxConfigIpxConfigAdminStatus.description: The immediate desired status of the IPX network protocol. Setting this object to open will inject an administrative open event into the IPX network protocol's finite state machine. Setting this object to close will inject an administrative close event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine.

pppxConfigCcpConfigAdminStatus.name: pppxConfigCcpConfigAdminStatus
pppxConfigCcpConfigAdminStatus.description: The immediate desired status of the IPX network protocol. Setting this object to open will inject an administrative open event into the IPX network protocol's finite state machine. Setting this object to close will inject an administrative close event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine.

pppxConfigRemoteIpAddress.name: pppxConfigRemoteIpAddress
pppxConfigRemoteIpAddress.description: The Remote IP address of the PPP connection. If set to 0.0.0.0 and IP routing is enabled then the IP address will be learned during the IP LCP negotiation. If set to a value then no IP address negotiation will occur.

pppxConfigAuthenticationType.name: pppxConfigAuthenticationType
pppxConfigAuthenticationType.description: The desired Authentication protocol to use for this PPP connection.

pppxConfigUserIdToRemote.name: pppxConfigUserIdToRemote
pppxConfigUserIdToRemote.description: User ID sent to remote during PAP or CHAP Authentication. If this string is empty, then no local to remote authentication will occur.

pppxConfigPasswordToRemote.name: pppxConfigPasswordToRemote
pppxConfigPasswordToRemote.description: Password sent to remote during PAP or CHAP Authentication. If this string is empty, then no local to remote authentication will occur.

pppxConfigUserIdFromRemote.name: pppxConfigUserIdFromRemote
pppxConfigUserIdFromRemote.description: User ID expected to be received remote during PAP or CHAP Authentication. If this string is empty, then no remote to local authentication will be required.

pppxConfigPasswordFromRemote.name: pppxConfigPasswordFromRemote
pppxConfigPasswordFromRemote.description: Password expected to be received remote during PAP or CHAP Authentication. If this string is empty, then no remote to local authentication will be required.

pppxConfigMaxFailureCount.name: pppxConfigMaxFailureCount
pppxConfigMaxFailureCount.description: PPP LCP and NCP Negotiation Maximum Failure Count

pppxConfigMaxConfigureCount.name: pppxConfigMaxConfigureCount
pppxConfigMaxConfigureCount.description: PPP LCP Negotiation Maximum Configure Count

pppxConfigMaxTerminateCount.name: pppxConfigMaxTerminateCount
pppxConfigMaxTerminateCount.description: PPP LCP Negotiation Maximum Terminate Count

pppxCpTable.name: pppxCpTable
pppxCpTable.description: A table of PPP connection Link Control and Network Control Protocol status and statistics information.

pppxCpEntry.name: pppxCpEntry
pppxCpEntry.description: An entry in the table, containing information about the PPP LCP and NCP status and statistics.

pppxCpPeerID.name: pppxCpPeerID
pppxCpPeerID.description: A unique ID which identifies this PPP Control Protocol entity.

pppxCpSlotIndex.name: pppxCpSlotIndex
pppxCpSlotIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this WSM board slot that the PPP Control Protocol Entity is running on. A value of zero is returned when PPP is not currently assigned to a slot (e.g. for PPP for an incoming ISDN call.

pppxCpPortIndex.name: pppxCpPortIndex
pppxCpPortIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this WSM port that the PPP Control Protocol Entity is running on. A value of zero is returned when PPP is not currently assigned to a slot (e.g. for PPP for an incoming ISDN call.)

pppxCpIpOperStatus.name: pppxCpIpOperStatus
pppxCpIpOperStatus.description: The operational status of the IP network protocol. If the value of this object is up then the finite state machine for the IP network protocol has reached the Opened state.

pppxCpIpxOperStatus.name: pppxCpIpxOperStatus
pppxCpIpxOperStatus.description: The operational status of the IPX network protocol. If the value of this object is up then the finite state machine for the IP network protocol has reached the Opened state.

pppxCpBcpOperStatus.name: pppxCpBcpOperStatus
pppxCpBcpOperStatus.description: The operational status of the BCP network protocol. If the value of this object is up then the finite state machine for the IP network protocol has reached the Opened state.

pppxCpCcpOperStatus.name: pppxCpCcpOperStatus
pppxCpCcpOperStatus.description: The operational status of the CCP network protocol. If the value of this object is up then the finite state machine for the IP network protocol has reached the Opened state.

pppxCpTxLcpPackets.name: pppxCpTxLcpPackets
pppxCpTxLcpPackets.description: The total number of transmitted Link Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

pppxCpRxLcpPackets.name: pppxCpRxLcpPackets
pppxCpRxLcpPackets.description: The total number of received Link Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

pppxCpTxIpcpPackets.name: pppxCpTxIpcpPackets
pppxCpTxIpcpPackets.description: The total number of transmitted IP Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

pppxCpRxIpcpPackets.name: pppxCpRxIpcpPackets
pppxCpRxIpcpPackets.description: The total number of received IP Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

pppxCpTxIpxcpPackets.name: pppxCpTxIpxcpPackets
pppxCpTxIpxcpPackets.description: The total number of transmitted IPX Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

pppxCpRxIpxcpPackets.name: pppxCpRxIpxcpPackets
pppxCpRxIpxcpPackets.description: The total number of received IPX Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

pppxCpTxBcpPackets.name: pppxCpTxBcpPackets
pppxCpTxBcpPackets.description: The total number of transmitted Bridge Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

pppxCpRxBcpPackets.name: pppxCpRxBcpPackets
pppxCpRxBcpPackets.description: The total number of received Bridge Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

pppxCpTxCcpPackets.name: pppxCpTxCcpPackets
pppxCpTxCcpPackets.description: The total number of transmitted Compression Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

pppxCpRxCcpPackets.name: pppxCpRxCcpPackets
pppxCpRxCcpPackets.description: The total number of received Compression Control Protocol packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTable.name: pppxStatsTable
pppxStatsTable.description: A table of PPP connection statistics information.

pppxStatsEntry.name: pppxStatsEntry
pppxStatsEntry.description: An entry in the table, containing information about the PPP PPP connection statistics.

pppxStatsPeerID.name: pppxStatsPeerID
pppxStatsPeerID.description: A unique ID which identifies the PPP Control Protocol entity associated with this PPP link.

pppxStatsIfIndex.name: pppxStatsIfIndex
pppxStatsIfIndex.description: The ifindex that represents this PPP link.

pppxStatsSlotIndex.name: pppxStatsSlotIndex
pppxStatsSlotIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this HSM board slot that this PPP link is running on.

pppxStatsPortIndex.name: pppxStatsPortIndex
pppxStatsPortIndex.description: A unique value which identifies this WSM submodule port that this PPP link is running on.

pppxStatsSubIndex.name: pppxStatsSubIndex
pppxStatsSubIndex.description: A unique value which identifies the sub-element of the WSM submodule port that this PPP link is running on. For Serial ports this will always return 0. For ISDN BRI ports, this will return 1 or 2 for B1 or B2 channel respectively.

pppxStatsTxIPOctets.name: pppxStatsTxIPOctets
pppxStatsTxIPOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within routed IP format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTxIPPackets.name: pppxStatsTxIPPackets
pppxStatsTxIPPackets.description: The total number of transmitted routed IP format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxIPOctets.name: pppxStatsRxIPOctets
pppxStatsRxIPOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within routed IP format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxIPPackets.name: pppxStatsRxIPPackets
pppxStatsRxIPPackets.description: The total number of received routed IP format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTxIPXOctets.name: pppxStatsTxIPXOctets
pppxStatsTxIPXOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within routed IPX format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTxIPXPackets.name: pppxStatsTxIPXPackets
pppxStatsTxIPXPackets.description: The total number of transmitted routed IPX format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxIPXOctets.name: pppxStatsRxIPXOctets
pppxStatsRxIPXOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within routed IPX format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxIPXPackets.name: pppxStatsRxIPXPackets
pppxStatsRxIPXPackets.description: The total number of received routed IPX format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTxBPDUOctets.name: pppxStatsTxBPDUOctets
pppxStatsTxBPDUOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within BPDU packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTxBPDUPackets.name: pppxStatsTxBPDUPackets
pppxStatsTxBPDUPackets.description: The total number of transmitted BPDU packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxBPDUOctets.name: pppxStatsRxBPDUOctets
pppxStatsRxBPDUOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within BPDU packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxBPDUPackets.name: pppxStatsRxBPDUPackets
pppxStatsRxBPDUPackets.description: The total number of received BPDU packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTxEthernetOctets.name: pppxStatsTxEthernetOctets
pppxStatsTxEthernetOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within bridged 802.3 format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTxEthernetPackets.name: pppxStatsTxEthernetPackets
pppxStatsTxEthernetPackets.description: The total number of transmitted bridged 802.3 format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxEthernetOctets.name: pppxStatsRxEthernetOctets
pppxStatsRxEthernetOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within bridged 802.3 format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxEthernetPackets.name: pppxStatsRxEthernetPackets
pppxStatsRxEthernetPackets.description: The total number of received bridged 802.3 format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTx8025Octets.name: pppxStatsTx8025Octets
pppxStatsTx8025Octets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within 8025 packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTx8025Packets.name: pppxStatsTx8025Packets
pppxStatsTx8025Packets.description: The total number of transmitted 8025 packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRx8025Octets.name: pppxStatsRx8025Octets
pppxStatsRx8025Octets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within 8025 packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRx8025Packets.name: pppxStatsRx8025Packets
pppxStatsRx8025Packets.description: The total number of received 8025 packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTxFDDIOctets.name: pppxStatsTxFDDIOctets
pppxStatsTxFDDIOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within FDDI packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTxFDDIPackets.name: pppxStatsTxFDDIPackets
pppxStatsTxFDDIPackets.description: The total number of transmitted FDDI packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxFDDIOctets.name: pppxStatsRxFDDIOctets
pppxStatsRxFDDIOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within FDDI packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxFDDIPackets.name: pppxStatsRxFDDIPackets
pppxStatsRxFDDIPackets.description: The total number of received FDDI packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTxCompressedOctets.name: pppxStatsTxCompressedOctets
pppxStatsTxCompressedOctets.description: The total number of transmitted octets (including the PPP Header field) within compressed format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTxCompressedPackets.name: pppxStatsTxCompressedPackets
pppxStatsTxCompressedPackets.description: The total number of transmitted compressed format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxCompressedOctets.name: pppxStatsRxCompressedOctets
pppxStatsRxCompressedOctets.description: The total number of received octets (including the PPP Header field) within compressed format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxCompressedPackets.name: pppxStatsRxCompressedPackets
pppxStatsRxCompressedPackets.description: The total number of received compressed format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsTxPrecompressedOctets.name: pppxStatsTxPrecompressedOctets
pppxStatsTxPrecompressedOctets.description: The total number of octets (including the PPP Header field) prior to compression of data for transmission within compressed format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxDecompressedOctets.name: pppxStatsRxDecompressedOctets
pppxStatsRxDecompressedOctets.description: The total number of octets (including the PPP Header field) after decompression of data received within compressed format packets on this PPP connection.

pppxStatsRxCompressedDiscards.name: pppxStatsRxCompressedDiscards
pppxStatsRxCompressedDiscards.description: The total number of received compressed format packets on this PPP connection that were discarded due to error or lost packets (e.g. out of sequence, decompression errors, etc.)

pppxIncomingTable.name: pppxIncomingTable
pppxIncomingTable.description: A table of PPP protocol entity Incoming configuration information.

pppxIncomingEntry.name: pppxIncomingEntry
pppxIncomingEntry.description: An entry in the PPP Entity Configuration table, containing information about PPP protocol configuration.

pppxIncomingIndex.name: pppxIncomingIndex
pppxIncomingIndex.description: Index to uniquelly identify this entry .

pppxIncomingAdminStatus.name: pppxIncomingAdminStatus
pppxIncomingAdminStatus.description: This object controls the Administrative Status of this Incoming Entity. Enabled will allow the Incoming Entity to operate. Disabled will disable the Incoming Entity without deleting it. Delete will disable the Incoming entity and delete the PPP configuration record.

pppxIncomingAuthenticationType.name: pppxIncomingAuthenticationType
pppxIncomingAuthenticationType.description: The desired Authentication protocol to use for this PPP connection.

pppxIncomingUserIdToRemote.name: pppxIncomingUserIdToRemote
pppxIncomingUserIdToRemote.description: User ID sent to remote during PAP or CHAP Authentication. If this string is empty, then no local to remote authentication will occur.

pppxIncomingPasswordToRemote.name: pppxIncomingPasswordToRemote
pppxIncomingPasswordToRemote.description: Password sent to remote during PAP or CHAP Authentication. If this string is empty, then no local to remote authentication will occur.

pppxIncomingBridgingVLAN.name: pppxIncomingBridgingVLAN
pppxIncomingBridgingVLAN.description: The VLAN Group for PPP bridging. A value of zero(0) indicates that this PPP port will not perform a bridging service and will discard all bridged format packets received or transmitted. A non-zero value indicates the bridging VLAN to be used.

pppxIncomingRoutingVLAN.name: pppxIncomingRoutingVLAN
pppxIncomingRoutingVLAN.description: The default VLAN for new PVCs that have not been configured for a routing Service. A value of zero(0) indicates that unconfigured VCs will not perform a routing service and will discard all routed format packets received or transmitted. A non-zero value indicates the routing VLAN to be used if the network informs the port of a new VC.

pppxIncomingCompressionType.name: pppxIncomingCompressionType
pppxIncomingCompressionType.description: This object controls whether or not PPP will not perform compression (none) or the type of compression to attempt to negotiate for.

pppxIncomingIpConfigAdminStatus.name: pppxIncomingIpConfigAdminStatus
pppxIncomingIpConfigAdminStatus.description: The immediate desired status of the IP network protocol. Setting this object to open will inject an administrative open event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine. Setting this object to close will inject an administrative close event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine.

pppxIncomingBcpConfigAdminStatus.name: pppxIncomingBcpConfigAdminStatus
pppxIncomingBcpConfigAdminStatus.description: The immediate desired status of the BCP network protocol. Setting this object to open will inject an administrative open event into the BCP network protocol's finite state machine. Setting this object to close will inject an administrative close event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine.

pppxIncomingIpxConfigAdminStatus.name: pppxIncomingIpxConfigAdminStatus
pppxIncomingIpxConfigAdminStatus.description: The immediate desired status of the IPX network protocol. Setting this object to open will inject an administrative open event into the IPX network protocol's finite state machine. Setting this object to close will inject an administrative close event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine.

pppxIncomingCcpConfigAdminStatus.name: pppxIncomingCcpConfigAdminStatus
pppxIncomingCcpConfigAdminStatus.description: The immediate desired status of the CCP network protocol. Setting this object to open will inject an administrative open event into the IPX network protocol's finite state machine. Setting this object to close will inject an administrative close event into the IP network protocol's finite state machine.
